Verses.12: But He, having offered one sacrifice for all sins forever, sat down at the right hand of God.
Verses.13: Since that time, he has been waiting until his enemies are made a footstool for his feet.
Verses.14: For by his one offering, He has perfected forever all who are sanctified.

Changes: 2022-05-02 - Paul Prins: Corrections based on feedback to verses 12-14
2021-05-02 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 12-14 based on Greek.
